Name: Crach an Craite
Ability: Shuffle all cards from each player's graveyard back into their decks.
Quote: "A king's gotta be wise. A king's gotta command respect. A king's gotta have stones."

Name: Emhyr var Emreis Emperor of Nilfgaard
Ability: Look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand.
Quote: "Your motives do not interest me. Only results."

Name: Emhyr var Emreis His Imperial Majesty
Ability: Pick a Torrential Rain card from your deck and play it instantly.
Quote: "The skies wept when my Pavetta died. They will not weep for me."

Name: Emhyr var Emreis Invader of the North
Ability: Abilities that restore a unit to the battlefield restore a randomly-chosen unit. Affects both players.
Quote: "Emperors command magnitudes, yet cannot control two things: their time and their hearts."

Name: Emhyr var Emreis the Relentless
Ability: Draw a card from your opponent's discard pile.
Quote: "They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless."

Name: Emhyr var Emreis the White Flame
Ability: Cancel your opponent's Leader Ability.
Quote: "A sword is but one of many tools at a rules's disposal."

Name: Eredin Breacc Glas the Treacherous
Ability: Doubles the strength of all spy cards (affects both players).
Quote: "I'm enjoying this. You are my toy."

Name: Eredin Bringer of Death
Ability: Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Quote: "Go on. Show me your spins, pirouettes and feints. I want to watch."

Name: Eredin Commander of the Red Riders
Ability: Double the strength of all your Close Combat units (unless a Commander's horn is also present on that row).
Quote: "Have some dignity. You know how this will end."

Name: Eredin Destroyer of Worlds
Ability: Discard 2 card and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.
Quote: "It is unavoidable."

Name: Eredin King of the Wild Hunt
Ability: Pick any weather card from your deck and play it instantly.
Quote: "I've long awaited this…"

Name: Foltest King of Temeria
Ability: Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.
Quote: "It is natural and beautiful that a man should love his sister."

Name: Foltest Lord Commander of the North
Ability: Clear any weather effects (resulting from Biting Frost, Torrential Rain or Impenetrable Fog cards) in play.
Quote: "Sod advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades."

Name: Foltest Son of Medell
Ability: Destroy your enemy's strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.
Quote: "Dammit, I rule this land and I refuse to creep around its corners."

Name: Foltest the Siegemaster
Ability: Doubles the strength of all your Siege units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).
Quote: "A well-aimed ballista razes not just the enemy's walls, but his morale as well."

Name: Foltest the Steel-Forged
Ability: Destroy your enemy's strongest Siege unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege units is 10 or more.
Quote: "A beautiful day for battle."

Name: Francesca Findabair Daisy of the Valley
Ability: Draw an extra card at the beginning of the battle
Quote: "The Elder Races have forgotten more than humans can ever hope to know."

Name: Francesca Findabair Hope of the Aen Seidhe
Ability: Move agile units to whichever valid row maximizes their strength (don't move units already in optimal row).
Quote: "Daede sian caente, Aen Seidhe en'allane ael coeden…"

Name: Francesca Findabair Pureblood Elf
Ability: Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.
Quote: "Ash shall fertilize the soil. By spring, the valley shall bloom once more."

Name: Francesca Findabair Queen of Dol Blathanna
Ability: Destroy your enemy's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.
Quote: "To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human opression's cruel finale."

Name: Francesca Findabair the Beautiful
Ability: Doubles the strength of all your Ranged Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).
Quote: "Do not let my beauty distract your aim."

Name: King Bran
Ability: Units only lose half their Strength in bad weather conditions.
Quote: "No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try."
